list_definition.mean_english: đĩa phẳng (bằng gỗ để đựng thức ăn)
list_definition.definition: a kind of large, flat plate

list_ex_of_english: Such software is referred to as a "disk" operating system when the storage devices it manages are made of rotating platters, such as floppy disks or hard disks.
Increasing the density allows the number of platters to be reduced for any given amount of storage.

The food is generally served in stainless steel thalis (platters).
Often served on large platters, picadas are usually served at gatherings and for special occasions.
Saladoid ceramics include zoomorphic effigy vessels, incense burners, platters, trays, jars, bowls with strap handles, and bell-shaped containers.
However, this head hovers mere nanometers from the platter's surface which makes a collision an acknowledged risk.
In the hard-disk drive the hard-drive heads fly and move radially over the surface of the spinning platters to read or write the data.
